import React, { Component } from 'react'; import $ from 'jquery'; class UpdateUser extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { userId: this.props.userId, userList: this.props.userList, userName: "", surname: "", Email: "", userGroup: "", subscribeto: "", } } componentDidMount() { const { userId, userList } = this.state; userList.map((value) => { if (parseInt(userId) === parseInt(value.id)) { this.setState({ userName: value.name, surname: value.surname, Email: value.Email, userGroup: value.userGroup, subscribeto: value.subscribeto, }) } }) } render() { const { userName, surname, Email} = this.state; return (
